participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and creative, Emily loves to be social and enjoys expressing herself through baking and music.
participant_1.background: I want a home where I can entertain my friends and play my Lindsey Stirling albums loud. I want to have more fun with my siblings. I work five days a week. I enjoy karaoke every Friday night. I like to bake.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Motivated and music-loving, Jake enjoys staying fit and has a passion for playing various instruments.
participant_2.background: I'm not married, but I have a fitness tracker that helps me stay motivated and track my progress. I'm from Austin, Texas. I look forward to retiring. I play many instruments. I work a dead end 9 to 5 job as a snakeskin oil salesman.

content.text: Hey! I'm a fan of Lindsey Stirling.
Me too! I've seen her in concert a couple of times.
That's awesome! I'd love to see her in concert one day.
You should! She's an amazing performer.
What's your favorite song by her?
It's hard to choose just one, but I'd say "Crystallize" is probably my favorite.
That's a great song! I love the violin in it.
Me too! What other artists do you like?
I like a lot of different music, but some of my favorites are Imagine Dragons, Coldplay, and Ed Sheeran.
Those are all great artists! I love Imagine Dragons and Coldplay.
Me too! They're both so talented.
Yeah, they are. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to bake, play karaoke, and spend time with my family and friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to play music, go to the gym, and read.
Those are all great hobbies! I wish I could play music.
It's not too hard to learn! I started playing when I was a kid.
I might have to give it a try sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will.
Cool! I'd love to hear you play sometime.
